long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds needed functionalities to Canvas. Help boost your productivity with useful features as:

-Highlight and unhighlight groups to hide them in your menu
-Group cards on Dashboard
-Custom links that are group and course specific
-Useful shortcuts on dashboard (TU Eindhoven specific)

Features on the to-do list:
-Custom colours for group cards on dashboard
-Custom shortcut links on dashboard
-Menu to choose the desired features
-Save Chrome tab groups per course/group

If you have any other feature ideas leave them below on Github.

The complete extension is open-sourced and can be found at the following link:
https://github.com/coencoensmeets/Canvas-Extention

this extension is not Affiliated with either TU Eindhoven or Canvas.
